treatment-md.title: Trizocheles spinidigitus Komai & Chan, 2016, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: “ Symmetrical ” hermit crabs of the family Pylochelidae (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura) collected by the “ BIOPAPUA ” and “ PAPUA NIUGINI ” expeditions in the Papua New Guinea, with descriptions of two new species
